website_summaries.verdict: Excellent starter glove for those looking to begin sparring, as it has a pre-curved design.
pros: Construction of these sparring gloves includes a gel and impact foam for comfort and protection
Uses a Velcro wrist closure so you can easily take off and put on these sparring gloves
Available in three different color combinations and five different weights
Sizes available for both kids and adults
cons: Materials in the sparring gloves may tear after several uses

customer_reviews.title: The gloves are of fantastic quality. The gel lining gives these a luxurious ...
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are of fantastic quality. The gel lining gives these a luxurious feel and secure fit, and helps with impact resistance. After wearing these gloves for three hours, my hands were still more dry and cool compared to the pair of gloves I ordered 6 months ago from a more mainstream company. The wrist strap goes all the way around your wrist which makes this pair of gloves safer than those pairs that only strap a little bit over the wrist. I'm very happy with this product. I found my new pair of gloves! Excellent work, Elite Sports.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Florez

customer_reviews.title: Anyone looking to get great gloves without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.text: Anyone looking to get great gloves without breaking the bank, I highly recommend these. My favorite feature of these is the gel padding around the wrist. Anyone who has ever blocked a flurry of punches and been caught on the wrist knows it sucks. These eliminate that issue in a pretty simple way. I'll also say these things are very comfortable. Easy to slide on over hand wraps and quick to get off as well. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Shane T.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stylish, and breathable. Great first pair of gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Great first pair of gloves! These are super comfortable, really nice looking, and very breathable. I ordered the 14 oz red and black pair for use in Muay Thai and Boxing (I'm a beginner in both). They are well padded and easy to get on and off, and also somewhat flexible, making clinching and grabbing easier. I'm pretty petite, but the gloves do not feel too big or bulky and I'm very happy with how they've felt when hitting the bag hard. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M. Zampetti

customer_reviews.title: Solid looking and feeling gloves for an excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: First off, they come in a very nice looking case, which was an unexpected, but welcome surprise. I have pretty large hands and the 14oz fit nicely. The wrap around the wrist area is wide and has a very snug feel once secured. I have dedicated bag gloves, so these are more for light sparring and kickboxing combos. On the sparring side, they are not too big to where they are easily blocked and have enough cushion to protect both sides. No issues hitting the bag hard a few times, though. Simply hard to beat at the price point!
customer_reviews.author: Steve P.

customer_reviews.title: Elite Sports Standard Glove - Training Review
customer_reviews.text: These gloves arrived today and after my first test run with them I'm very satisfied. They offer solid protection on the front of the fist and back of the hand, and the stitching is solid. The mesh in the palm definitely makes a difference in the amount of sweat gets stored inside (I sweat a lot). I do recommend getting some wraps to help offer some tightness in the glove, (  ). I will post an update on how these gloves hold up to steady training over the next few weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Ronin

customer_reviews.title: Better than more expensive Everlast
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for new boxing gloves because the ones I use to hit pads and the heavy bag are very worn down offering very little protection. So I was looking for an inexpensive glove that could do the job. My friend suggested that I try these gloves out. They shipped out quickly and when I got them I was pleasantly surprised. I've paid more than this for boxing gloves before and gotten a lesser product. The stitching looks solid, the 14oz padding absorbs shock well, and the wrist offers a lot of support. I would absolutely buy these again and recommend them to anyone looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for muy thai training
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are an absolute deal. The build quality feels really exceptional. The gloves feel great during workouts. My only complaint is that the strap feels a little short, but I may just be used to longer-strapped gloves. (Buyers should also note that the netting on the palm side will start to fray as the velcro straps may attach to it, it's just not made for that. To be fair, my handwraps fray for the same reason.)
customer_reviews.author: adteutla

customer_reviews.title: Great overall design
customer_reviews.text: There are plenty of options out there when it comes to boxing gloves... but what sets these apart from other brands is the padding around the wrist. For someone that trains a wide variety of clients, novice to advanced, those that just start boxing can run into wrists pains as they punch. (Until they learn proper technique of course.) This helps give the client more protection during those early phases without limiting their movement in anyway. Great overall design!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these! This is my third pair of boxing ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! This is my third pair of boxing gloves. Although I was a bit skeptical at first because of the low cost, I found them to be a nice quality. My first round and they’re already feeling broken in. They’re easy to put on and take off with the long Velcro wrist wrap and there’s a bit of extra protective support for the fingers inside. Love them! With the price, I could have gotten a few more colors.
customer_reviews.author: nancy eldomiatti

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done for reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for kickboxing fitness class. The gloves they offered in the studio were disgusting and smelled so bad. I just wanted something inexpensive for the class. The gloves are lightly padded compared to what was offered in the studio. They go on/off pretty easy. The stitching looks decent. There were no rough spots on my hands when using the gloves. Not much ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: they run very small these would be fine for like light sparing or light bag work
customer_reviews.text: These feel SO CHEAP! the plastic to the way they fit, they run very small these would be fine for like light sparing or light bag work. They are utter trash on the heavy bag and don't hit well on a 100lb bag at all. They look like they will last a bit but I really disliked these gloves I have used over 12 + gloves in 10 years and these are bottom 5
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be good quality but fit very small
customer_reviews.text: Seem decent upon initial inspection. I do muay thai, boxing and kickboxing and they did fit extremely tightly, almost too much so (and I'm a very small woman, I do not have large hands). I did like that when I opened the package I was not overwhelmed with the smell of chemicals like other gloves I've bought, these seem to be a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These got a tear on the inside near the thumb after about a month. Now after 5 months of regular use most of the padding is out and my hand hurts after every muay thai class. Also leather is coming off from the tips of the gloves. How long are these supposed to last?? Will not buy again. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: DSK

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are my new favorite pair of boxing gloves BY FAR! The wrists fits so well and not too tight. Makes me feel very safe when throwing power! The gloves are soft and durable. They really do a great job of keeping ur hands snug and cushioned as well as stabilising the wrist! I highly recommend these for anybody who cares about quality and safety! 5 stars! 👊
customer_reviews.author: Trap Gambino

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome! I got the 12oz gloves about 3 weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I got the 12oz gloves about 3 weeks ago. I'm currently on a training camp for Team USA kickboxing and we train 4x per day. 5 days per week. These gloves are durable, comfortable and most importantly very affordable! My favorite features are the Maya fabric and the antimicrobial lining which keep my gloves smell free. no more stinking training bag 🙂
customer_reviews.author: H. Peralta

customer_reviews.title: Ordered these wanting good bag gloves
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these wanting good bag gloves, a tighter glove with good protection. I got the 12oz glove and it’s probably the best fitting glove I’ve ordered. Very pleased with my product, and for the price it is a great buy. I would not recommend these for sparring, as they do conture well to to your hand and are not 16oz gloves nor do they feel like 16oz gloves. Very pleased over all
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: The Cadillac of training gloves at a Corolla price!
customer_reviews.text: Best training gloves on the market! I have been using Everlast for years. These gloves by Elite are not only more comfortable but less expensive! After weeks of use I did a side by side and put the Elite glove on my dominant hand and my Everlast on my other. I could immediately feel the difference in shock absorption and fatigue. These gloves are padded with gel and can keep you training for longer!
customer_reviews.author: amehler

customer_reviews.title: Like I said
customer_reviews.text: I think they just need to be worn in a little bit but these took the skin off my knuckles my first time using them. Like I said, I just think the material was stiff. Otherwise was a great fit for me (5'6" 120 lb woman)
customer_reviews.author: Jvelo

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality!
customer_reviews.text: Avoid. After just 4-5 boxing classes that my 8 year old took these are totally falling apart. Both ripped. Horrible quality!
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for all parents looking to get their kids started in the sport!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 6 yr old. Once these gloves go on, he's a nonstop jabbing machine! He can go for about 15 to 20 mins training with me. Gets him tired which is benefit for me as a parent. Oh and I also bought a pair for my 3 yr old that came with a bag and headgear from another seller. So they're both hitting the bag. Really drains their energy and keeps them active daily and gives me time to get things done around the house run they run out of gas. Glad I bought these as it has improved his form when boxing! Great durability and a nice look to them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Cach

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY FROM THIS SELLER
customer_reviews.text: The seller of these gloves doesn't have any correct contact information linked with their products. This is a fake Elite Sports account. My glove is falling apart from the inside and I tried contacting Elite Sports directly and they said that they could not help because amazon has a 3rd party seller and they wont warranty the gloves. I also contacted the phone number linked with this add, and they said that they don't even sell boxing gloves. So! DONT BUY FROM THIS SELLER If anythin happens with your gloves...you're outta luck
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I only got to wear them once before I couldn't continue with the krav maga class I needed them for, but they are comfortable and look sleek. I got 10oz and I have fairly small hands and stand 5'3 and weight 125. There was a small seam starting to unravel/sticking out so I can't say how well they withstand long usage, but great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nova

customer_reviews.title: Not totally breathable
customer_reviews.text: I'm doing circuit boxing for exercise, not to be a star fighter. While these gloves have more mesh along the inside of the glove than others I looked at, there is still a liner/backing (i.e. the mesh holes don't go the whole way through) so my hands still get sweaty. Underneath I wear the handwrap gloves and it helps. These were the best choice of the 3 pair I got to try. They could be better if there were a couple holes in the thumb leather and if the liner was removed from the inside under the mesh. The padding is good at 14oz and I've only been doing this for 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Rouzer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gloves for all level of fighters
customer_reviews.text: As an mma fighter tues boxing gloves are perfect for working pads, the bag, and sparring. They have a very secure fit and the curve for the fingers is exactly what I look for. I recommend them for fighters and cardio kickboxers alike.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyb

customer_reviews.title: Affordable high quality boxing gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t let the price fool you, these boxing gloves are made of high quality material. I love the black on black gloves I purchased for myself, it included matte black and gloss black and it was perfectly designed. I purchased these gloves because my previous gloves were completely torn but I couldn’t afford to buy some new name brand gloves due to a small hobby budget. The feel of these gloves highly exceeded my exceptions, to myself they feel better then my previous pair of gloves. If you are looking for a new pair of boxing gloves, look no further. Purchase yourself some of these affordable high quality gloves and box with confidence on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Alessor

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: love the feel of the gloves. But the stitching has already ripped and I have had the gloves for only 2months
customer_reviews.author: Carol LaMarr

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 12 oz gloves for my daughter for kickboxing. They are great! They are great quality! they look great and are very appealing to the eye and the size was perfect! I was very impressed with the quality given how inexpensive they were! I will definitely purchase more products from this company in the refer them to anybody!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: They sent to left gloves..... Ruined my son's birthday.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Gloves received on time. Game to my son after I gave him his new heavy bag. You said Dad we have a problem. I'm like what's the problem, there's two less gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I used these gloves the past week for bag work, pads, and sparring and found them to be great. They hold up and fit my hand perfectly. I selected the 14 oz. gloves and they work phenomally! These gloves are not only a good price but great and last. The leather is crisp like any other glove. It is also very protective, while sparring and hitting the heavy bag my hands did not hurt after or during like some gloves in the past. Overall, If you are looking for a glove at a good price these would be my top choice!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I love my gloves once I cut off the material connecting the thumb to the palm. The way they came it was hard to put on the second glove and hard to take off the first glove. I felt like I was in the move, "The White Dawn" when the Eskimo girls put the thumb less gloves on the white guys... But, after I cut off that material, they were easy to put on and take off!
customer_reviews.author: Silicon Valley Guy

customer_reviews.title: Elite Sports Boxing/Kickboxing Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves come in 3 colors and in 3 sizes 10, 12 and 14oz. What I like about this glove the travel bag it comes with, the glove is well constructed with a mesh palm. The one unique feature is the elastic strap which I believe gives the glove a secured fit. I'm considering converting my cardio kickboxing class to this glove. Wish this glove came in a 16oz, 18oz, and 20oz.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE GUERRIDO

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit and Super Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Gloves are very well made and fit my hands nice and snug. They also look sharp! I hit the bag with them last night and was very impressed! You cant go wrong with Elite gear! I have been impressed several times over. Customer service is also second to none!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Boston

customer_reviews.title: Nice fitting but falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these gloves in December and after using them 3xs a week at the gym for 3 months they are pulling away at the seams. Also, don’t believe for one second that the mesh material is enough to keep the gloves dry after you sweat in them. My gloves could walk away they stink so bad. For as excited I was when I first put them on, I really hoped these gloves would’ve lasted longer. I guess I will be dropping $20 every 3 months! I had a pair of Century gloves that lasted me at least 10 years and the seams are still stronger than ever! It’s sad how they make products now.
customer_reviews.author: Office Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good Gloves, good quality Not name brand but they will do the Job and more
customer_reviews.text: I use this bad boys twice a week, once when I been lazy on a round punching bag on my garage, I got them after 3 months of a not using my pair of 16oz Everlast gloces due to a heel spring, when I try to use them they pretty much dismantled on my 1st workout. This new gloves it has been 9 months the Gel moved a bit as expected but the fake leather has resisted the punches and I am a big guy, 6"2 260LbS and I do 12 rounds 2 1/2 minutes each, and sometimes on a speedball not always, but for the price, you get your money back, at least that is my personal experience.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Absolute best value you’re going to find
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of these gloves. I got them as a replacement for my home bag gloves(a set of everlasts from Walmart) and the difference in quality and feel is night and day...these gloves are an absolute steal at this price!! I have a set of much more expensive hayabusas for sparring and the “feel“ of these Elites rivals those. Gonna be tough to beat these on a bang for the buck scale👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Ronson Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking gloves my son loves them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these gloves for my son He likes the color and feel comfortable in his hands They don't slip off while he's throwing combos or hitting the punching bag Overall great gloves for the price and he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and fit so well on my hands I absolutely ...
customer_reviews.text: I've owned alot of boxing gloves over the years and I must say the Elite 14oz gloves are by far my favorites that i've ever owned over the course of my 12 year MMA experience. They are comfortable and fit so well on my hands I absolutely love them and all Elite products. And the prices are amazing for such top quality gear. I highly recommend Elite products to everyone looking to buy combat sports equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but last less then 6 months
customer_reviews.text: When I first started using them I liked them, even though they did not feel like they were top quality. But within a couple of month of using them, the black leather started to come off on one of the gloves and then after using them regularly for less than 6 months one of the gloves developed a tear along its stitching on the wrist. I would not recommend these gloves if you want them for long-term use.
customer_reviews.author: Teagan Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well
customer_reviews.text: I am a 6'2" 200lbs heavy hitter. The gloves are holding up very good and breathe much better than my last pair. They look really nice too.
customer_reviews.author: TRAVIS KAUFMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves at a great price. They feel good on the hands and have great wrist support. The materials are nice and the details makes them look sharp. They work well for bag work and my sparring partners say they're not bad to be hit with either. I really like this gloves!
customer_reviews.author: The Green Machine

customer_reviews.title: Great training gloves at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been training with these gloves for a week and I’m elated on how nice these gloves are for the price! I prefer the Velcro to support my wrists for bag work. And the liner for these gloves let my hands breathe. I have wide palms and my rested well with the curvature which helped me keep my hands relaxed when I’m not striking. The exterior is supple and the filling is dispersed nicely on impact. If you’re starting out or need some training/bag gloves, you can’t go wrong with them!
customer_reviews.author: Stvsan

customer_reviews.title: Great workout gloves for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these gloves 2-3 days a week for the past 6 months and they are still holding up! I don't compete or anything, I only train for exercise and overall fitness. But these gloves have held up great and you can't beat them for the price!
customer_reviews.author: KM.

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: These boxing gloves were purchased as a costume/prop for one of our shows. I actually didn't expect them to be very much because of the low price. I was so surprised! These are VERY well made gloves! High quality material and high quality construction. Light weight yet sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Fifield - Author & Playwright

customer_reviews.title: Mesh ventilation? Nope! Fooled ya!
customer_reviews.text: There's no mesh ventilation on the palm side. That's specifically what I was looking for. It's there on Amazon, but not on the gloves that arrived at my house. What they sent does not have any mesh. It's just not there at all. No mistaking it.
customer_reviews.author: daveywoods

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Low price.
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves!!! The quality is exceptional which I would have never expected for the very low price. I have used these to punch the heavy bag and for light sparring. The gel and foam lining make bag work a lot less stressful on the hands and the lining around the wrist makes blocking punches a lot less painful on the wrists! The color is also very vibrant and after quite a few hours of use it still hasn't scuffed off. I loved these gloves so much that we ended up purchasing another 3 pair for the rest of the family. Definitely worth every penny and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Axel R.

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't disappointed with these gloves at all. I got the 8oz bag gloves. The padding inside the glove is very well designed, I've been using them for everything sparring, pad work, and bad drills. I'm not someone that wraps my hand all the time but I had no pain in my knuckles or wrist. These gloves are well built! The price is amazing too!!
customer_reviews.author: Lycura.Jpg

customer_reviews.title: They fit great and protect his hands
customer_reviews.text: I got them for my nephew and he loves them. They fit great and protect his hands. So far no complaints. It was a few days late getting here but hey, what do you expect this close to Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: TCT

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Out of the package the feel like quality gloves that will take a beating! I picked up a pair of 10oz gloves for Muay Thai and Boxing bag and pad work, the gloves feel great and come with a ‘broken in’ feel, not to stiff but definitely not flimsy by any means! Awesome price point for training gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Slippery Pete

customer_reviews.title: Fishy stench!
customer_reviews.text: They smell awful! They have a fishy smell I can’t eliminate. I waited a couple weeks to write a review because I wanted to see if I could rid the gloves of the smell but I have been unsuccessful! I have tried using a hot blow dryer, sunshine, vinegar, and spraying with an essential oil mixture, however, the fishy stench remains! I bought my other daughter a different brand and hers smell fine. Such a disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Just getting into boxing/MMA? This is a great glove to start
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap and it gets the job. A great glove for kids or people just starting out that plan to take classes or work the bag a couple times a week. Obviously as you become more serious and rigorous in your training you may want to invest in some more expensive gloves but these are great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kangas

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves for MMA start!
customer_reviews.text: These are simply the best gloves for the money for non-professional fighters, part time trainees, and those training multiple styles where they are putting gloves on and off through practice. I have bought 3 pair for new students recently. Every student loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Eric A. Metzger

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves
customer_reviews.text: A great pair gloves. They feel EXTREMELY comfortable when I go to Maui Tai Class and I punch the bags. Definitely better than my Century Gloves. I also love the fact that this company had different color style to the gloves!!!! Was even more impressed when I saw they Blackk and Red!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emilio Ramon Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for a very low price
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised with how sharp the gloves look and nice they feel. I am a professional MMA fighter and recommend these gloves to anyone who wants great quality gloves without breaking the bank. I have not had the gloves for too long so I am still checking for durability but honestly at this price point I am sure I am getting my money’s worth and then some more. Dollar for dollar this is the best value ever and I like them better than my overprice brand name pair.
customer_reviews.author: Salaheddine Hemidach

customer_reviews.title: Not the Right Ones!
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed with the quality of these gloves. My grandson tried them and they were too small and he has a small hand. Doubtful they will hold up very long. Will not purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: 882c

customer_reviews.title: ... Elite Sports sparring gloves today and I am extremely happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Elite Sports sparring gloves today and I am extremely happy with them. They fit great and the quality of the material is phenomenal. I can tell these gloves were made with care. I have already tried them and the padding allows me to throw solid punches and not hurt my hand. I will appreciate them even more once they are broken in. Great gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice globes!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to use with our punching bag and they work great! The cushioning is nice and they're relatively easy to put on, even the second glove by myself. I'm using the punching back just for fun and recreationally and these gloves are perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: Connie D.

customer_reviews.title: High quality gloves for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my wife because she has been in a kickboxing class and her previous gloves were falling apart. The quality of these gloves are excellent! These are top of the line gloves, but they aren't super expensive. I tried these out as well and they are super comfortable and fit really well with great support. The wrist straps have great support for blocking and the Velcro holds really well. I highly recommend these gloves to anyone who is looking for comfortable, durable, high quality gloves for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: My son has wanted a pair of these for a long time. He was so surprised to get them. As soon as he opened the package he was wearing them and hitting some blocker bags. He will get to use them at his next tournament. It works well with his other gear that is white as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melynda

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great so far - solid structure, good fit, adjustable for either tighter wrist support or more loose to slip on/off during circuit training. I swapped a pair out for these and the service was fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Stitching on back of wrist tore after only five trips to the gym
customer_reviews.author: Alex M. Wymore

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of boxing gloves. Used them all week and they are very durable yet comfortable. I love the black and red color combo as well and they come in a perfect bag to store. Strongly suggest these gloves and will be buying more from Elite Sports.
customer_reviews.author: Niko Pjetri

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit
customer_reviews.text: I did a few sessions with these gloves and they made me nervous. I felt like I was going to hurt something in my hands or wrist. The hand position felt off to me. Not using these anymore, I don't trust them.
customer_reviews.author: Krdskoor

customer_reviews.title: Really Love These Gloves!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves in the green neon color signal exactly the same message that every the punch should ....proceed with caution when you fight me! These gel 12 oz gloves not only provide great protection , but excellent power transfer as well. The gel in the palm feels nice and forms well in my hands. They wrap on my wrist/forearm nicely, the extra seams make it tighter and more form fitting. Really love them!
customer_reviews.author: Sammie the Bull

customer_reviews.title: they love them. We have had them for about 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my kids Martial Arts sparring, they love them. We have had them for about 4 months used in sparring every week and have gone though several tournaments already, they still look new and have not broken down at all. A very quality glove for the price, I have bought 2 more sets since then. I don't know how they would hold up to an aggressive Adult on the bags, but for kids, they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my Elite boxing gloves! Great gloves at a great price! They're really nice looking gloves too. I also received very helpful customer service when I inquired about the kind of gloves that would be best for me. Thank you Elite!
customer_reviews.author: Kk

customer_reviews.title: Great brand!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year loves them. I got him the 4oz and they fit perfect and he loves them. Very comfortable and he loves to punch. Great brand so far and I’m impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Steven P Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and hold up well!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the gloves! They fit perfect on his hands and he can move his hands pretty well while wearing them. He’s having a blast boxing with dad. We purchased the 4oz he’s 2.5 years old. They are holding up well and they look professional.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: High quality gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Been training in martial arts since 1996. Been thru many pairs of gloves. These are very high quality. Good material and excellent stitching and insulation.
customer_reviews.author: YoungTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the product. Fits well on my average-sized 12-year-old, looks great and does the job for protecting his hands when hitting the punching bag. Happy with the value. It is a very nice price for the quality provided.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Bieberhousen

customer_reviews.title: Came quick, look great, feel great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughters taekwondo class-she requested pink and I thankfully could deliver! Got them today-super quick delivery- she loves them, they fit great. So far so good. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these gloves for my son’s kickboxing class as a cheap temporary set until he was sure he wanted to compete. His coach said these gloves are good enough to use even though they sell $100 gloves for this class at their school. I’m pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: Great for clinching!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are awesome! If you’re looking for good gloves to train in, this is it! They are great for bag/pads/sparring! I got the 12 ounce pair, and tbh they feel a lot lighter than 12 ounces! They offer great protection for your hands and wrists and are very comfortable. These are by far my favorite gloves and I would definitely order them again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I love the red gloves. Not only do they look slick, but they're also breathable and provides great wrist support as well. The grip on the fingers on the inside of the glove helps keep my fingers in close together to help generate more power. I bought heavier than standard competition size in order to increase my hand speed, and I notice a huge difference when running mitts. These products live up to their name!!
customer_reviews.author: SeanJ

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and we'll fitted. I've been boxing Muay Thai and American kickboxing for over 5 years. I own an expensive pair of Lonsdale gloves I keep at the gym, but use these as my backup gloves. Not a complaint to be had. Great for training. For reference, I'm 5'3" 135lb female and the 14 oz are perfect for heavy bag and shadow boxing training at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymee J.

customer_reviews.title: Really good. Padded well
customer_reviews.text: Really good. Padded well. My hands do sweat a little more than I expected in these but I am very pleased. I use them for a cardio boxing class.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective quality!
customer_reviews.text: These seem to fit my 5 and 7 year old well. They seem well made too. I'll be ordering some 16oz for me down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Billy R. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves very comfortable, my hands do sweat after a while but they seem to dry out and I haven't noticed any odor associated with them. My personal trainer likes them and they are actually a little heavier than what she was bringing to our sessions. Love them...
customer_reviews.author: Sue Lovetoread

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged and feels good on the hands. I thought because of the cost the quality would be poor, but they are really good gloves. We're still wearing them in and time will tell how they hold up, I suppose it also depends on how we treat them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received two right hand gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Received two of the same side glove (two right hands). Will return. The quality seems good but can't use them.
customer_reviews.author: Macsierra

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, very comfortable all around!
customer_reviews.text: I started a kickboxing training class and so I knew I wanted my own pair, I gave this boxing gloves a try and I am so happy I did! They fit super comfortable, as they have a sizing chart, it is NOT just a one-size-fits-all which is amazing, the colors are bright and I really enjoy the slit on the side of the wrist opening, so you get a perfect fit every time! Thank you Elite Sports, will be checking on more of the many other products they have to offer! :)
customer_reviews.author: tania

customer_reviews.title: Looking good at kickboxing class
customer_reviews.text: Gloves were delivered quickly and in original container. They are free of defects and are holding up well to kickboxing twice a week. Easy to clean up and maintain. The colors are cool too. :)
customer_reviews.author: Briancisme

customer_reviews.title: Smashing New Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited for my Elite Sports Kickboxing gloves! They are way more comfortable than I anticipated, which is surprising because I knew they would be the nicest gloves I've owned to date. The gel really makes a difference in the ring, which makes them my new go-to gloves. These top-of-the-line gloves are light, durable, and most importantly comfortable. Definitely using Elite Sports for all my kickboxing needs!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: PROFESSIONAL QUALITY FOR LESS
customer_reviews.text: HELL YEA! These gloves are professional quality without the price tag! As a professional martial artist I love training in stylish yet comfortable and quality gear and these are it! Im so happy I found them. The gel feels so good and has amazing wrist support without limiting you. I got 8 oz and they feel like a good weight to hit fast but also makes me feel faster when I take them off. Also they fit my 10 year old student as well as they fit my 26 year old fiancé it’s really a one size fits most super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Jewelianna Ramos-Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price/quality.
customer_reviews.text: Decent gloves, especially for the price. I have really small hands so I liked the size options. The design is cool and you can match it with other Elite gear if that's your thing.
customer_reviews.author: Rawkstah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I just used these last night to beat the crap out of a heavy bag last night. I recommend using hand wraps to Maximize comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone V. Banks

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great boxing gloves! 10 ounce is perfect for 12 year old and 15 year old! They came in perfect shape. I do not recommend for kids younger that nine. I recommend 4-8 ounce for those ages.
customer_reviews.author: BPboy216

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to clean them
customer_reviews.text: Great, has mesh for breathability. Make sure to keep them clean with wipes on outside and inside. I took some silica gels and keep them inside when storing them to make sure they stay dry and they dont' smell
customer_reviews.author: Jay Kim

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them
customer_reviews.text: My 5yo son just started kick boxing at the gym. They fit great, not too heavy or bulky. Great for beginners...
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend these to anyone looking for boxing gloves for their child. My son is 9 years old and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Petra Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Great First Impression
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors and the materials used. They fit great and I don’t have to force the glove to move with my hand. They seem pretty breathable but I haven’t had them long enough to confirm that or confirm their durability. I am excited to see how both of those things go. Great price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tara M

customer_reviews.title: Happy noobie.-
customer_reviews.text: They are my first so I can tell much, Iḿ just begining in the sport. They looked just as new after I heated every thing I found and felt nothing so thus far I like them.-
customer_reviews.author: Helena Amparo de León Cerizola

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase (have bought three sets now).
customer_reviews.text: Just bought two more sets for others, based on how much the first pair are liked.
customer_reviews.author: ezlyamused

customer_reviews.title: The elastic band is key👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are a perfect comfortable fit. The elastic band lets me get a really nice snug fit. With other gloves you can really only get them so tight and its kinda difficult to even get them to that point. But the elastic band really helps. Plus they have the perfect amount of padding to not slow me down, but still protect my partners faces lol
customer_reviews.author: Vicente

customer_reviews.title: and basketball so I know good equipment when I see it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been in all kinds of sports in my life including soccer, track, baseball, softball, and basketball so I know good equipment when I see it. I just recently got started in MMA. I must say I’m really impressed by the quality of the material of these gloves. They really feel like they would last a long time!!! They fit really well on my hands so they are very comfortable!!! Best of all they are affordable!!!! I definitely recommend them if you want a good pair of boxing gloves!!!!!! Thank you Elite Sports!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: My old Everlast bag gloves were falling apart and I decided I should upgrade to something a little nicer. These gloves are perfect for me. The padding and quality is far superior and they're very comfortable. Easy to get on and off with the wrap-around Velcro strap. They also shipped very quickly. Overall i'm very satisfied with these gloves and will be recommending them to my fellow boxers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: product was as described and it feels awesome punching bags. I the 14oz glove and it was able to fit my small hand, my 14 years old's hand and my 6 foot 5 husbands' hand. Just awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Ping Fung-houger

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Gloves are wonderful!! I’ve been using them for about a week and they are great. They fit snugly and provide great wrist support in all the right places. I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Best pair for an awesome price
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a pair of light weight gloves which provides proper wrist support and this one is up to the mark. I have been using venom and rdx gloves as well and so far I would rate elite as the best out of three.
customer_reviews.author: Fidelis Louis

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves it. I do wish it came with instructions for "breaking it in" as it's a bit stiff. Otherwise, exactly what we were hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: They fit and feel amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These eElite gloves not only look amazing they feel amazing. The last few sets of gloves I have had were awkward and felt bulky. These particular gloves I kept CHECKI g to make sure they were 16 ounces. They are awesome and I would recommend 100 times.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cunningham

product_meta.title: Boxing Gloves for Men, Women, and Kids, Elite Sports Kickboxing Punching Bag Pair of 2 Gloves
feature_bullets: ✅ KEEP YOUR FOCUS – These lightweight boxing gloves are made from the best quality PU leather. You will be very comfortable wearing our kickboxing gloves as they have Pre-curved anatomic hand design which means you don’t have to think about maintaining proper fist closure while training. These boxing gloves for men thus enhance performance allowing you to maintain focus.

✅ INCREASED PERFORMANCE W/ ADDED PROTECTION – The triple-density gel and impact foam added on the area of impact of our kids boxing gloves offers great protection you need to train and reach your goals while the pre-curved design adds more safety, style and functionality to it. The material we used in these kickboxing gloves for women is shock absorbent.

✅ SUPERIOR COMFORT – These 12 oz boxing gloves for women are very lightweight and super durable which is the key to fast precise punches, long training, and focused mind. Our boxing gloves for kids are easy to clean and maintain, giving you a comfortable fit and taking away the tension to clean these boxing gloves.

✅ MINIMIZE SPRAINS & INJURIES – The secure Velcro wrist closure with a stretchable leather wrist strap makes these men’s boxing gloves easy to put on and take off. Perfect fitting of our gloves avoids unnecessary sprains and injuries during training, sparring, and matches giving your hands and wrists the needed protection.

✅ YOUR HANDS WILL STAY COOL & DRY – These come as 2 pair boxing gloves for men, women, and kids having a 3D cooling mesh that will allow your hands to stay cool and dry with proper ventilation and airflow. This makes these boxing gloves multipurpose and ideal for all types of sports like boxing, kickboxing, sparing, and other workouts.
